ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; Gluttony Chapter 4
ComicInfo.Summary:
Pumpkinhead has been called up from Hell to exact vengeance against a cruel backwoods crime cartel. But his would-be victims have a few tricks of their own. They have summoned a group of their own restless demons with very specific instructionsâ€“destroy Pumpkinhead!
